title: Maintenance works for Sengkang & Punggol LRT systems scheduled

updates.text: Pls note that maintenance works will be conducted on the Sengkang & Punggol LRT systems on Sundays starting from 14 Jan 2018. Train svc will continue to operate on one platform, while the other platform will commence svc later at 7am on maintenance days. https://t.co/0JWQaXQKnI
